text:
RELIGION

Arulmigu Sundararaja Perumal Temple, Anbil: Masi maham festival, purappadu, 7 p.m.

Sri Varasiddhi Vinayagar Temple, Periyar Nagar: Discourse on Srimad Ramayanam, 6 p.m.

Organising Committee: Sri Seetha Kalyanam, Aditya Apartments, North Adayavalanjan Street, Srirangam, 8 a.m.; bavalimpu utsavam, 7 p.m.

Srimad Ubhaya Vedantacharya Peetam: “Bhagavata Dasamaskandam” by R. Anantharaman, 294, Sathara Street, Srirangam, 6.30 p.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Garuda Mandapam, Srirangam Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple, 5.15 p.m.; Nachiyar Kovil, Woraiyur, 6.45 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama nama parayanam, 58, Vinayagar Street, Amman Nagar, 6 p.m.

CULTURE

Rasika Ranjana Sabha: Centenary, Desathai Kathal Sei , drama by S. N.V. Creations, W.B. Road, 6.30 p.m.

GENERAL

SVD Fraternity, Tamil Nadu: National seminar on centenary memorial celebrations of Rev. Fr. Karl Ritz, Rev. Fr. Augustine Karamel, Arockia Annai Shrine, Vadipatti, chief guest, St. Charles Apostolic School, Ponmalaipatti, 9.30 a.m.

Sri Sathya Sai Seva Organisations: Sri Sathya Sai Balavikas convocation, Sri Sathya Sai Spiritual Centre, Srimathi Shiva Shankar, Vice President, HCL Technologies, Chennai, speaks, Srirangam, 9.45 a.m.

Tiruverumbur Thanjai Main Road-Navalpattu Road Viyaparigal Kootamaippu: Inaugural ceremony,A.M.Vikramaraja, State President, Tamil Nadu Vanigar Sangangalin Peramaippu, speaks, Bharath Thirumana Mandapam, Navalpattu Road, 4.30 p.m.

Centre for Ultimate Studies: Freelance researchers first conference on “Rock arts language-philosophy and history,” release of the book Kizhvalai Rock Art , G. Baskaran, Vice-Chancellor, Tamil University, chief guest, E.R. Higher Secondary School campus, 10 a.m.

Sangamam Multi State Cooperative Credit Society Limited: Introductory meeting, A.K. Residency Hall, near Chathram Bus Stand, 6.45 p.m.

Rajaji Vidyalaya: Annual sports meet, N. Annavi, former international athlete, chief guest, 8 a.m.
title: TIRUCHI today
